item.title: fateme add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "You cannot find peace by avoiding life." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: fateme add a quote by حسین پناهی
item.description: "و رسالت من این خواهد بود تا دو استکان چای داغ را از میان دویست جنگ خونین به سلامت بگذرانم تا در شبی بارانی آن ها را با خدای خویش چشم در چشم هم نوش کنیم" -- حسین پناهی

item.title: fateme add a quote by José Saramago
item.description: "Liking is probably the best form of ownership, and ownership the worst form of liking." -- José Saramago

item.title: fateme add a quote by virginia woolf
item.description: "As a woman I have no country. As a woman I want no country. As a woman, my country is the whole world." -- virginia woolf

item.title: fateme add a quote by Peter De Vries
item.description: "Sometimes I write drunk and revise sober, and sometimes I write sober and revise drunk. But you have to have both elements in creation — the Apollonian and the Dionysian, or spontaneity and restraint, emotion and discipline." -- Peter De Vries

item.title: fateme add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: fateme add a quote by José Saramago
item.description: "Inside us there is something that has no name, that something is what we are." -- José Saramago

item.title: fateme add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "If you do not tell the truth about yourself you cannot tell it about other people." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: fateme add a quote by حسین پناهی / Hosein Panaahi
item.description: "بيراهه رفته بودم آن شب دستم را گرفته بود و می‌كشيد زين بعد همه عمرم را بيراهه خواهم رفت" -- حسین پناهی / Hosein Panaahi

item.title: fateme add a quote by حسین پناهی
item.description: "بی تو هيچ چيز اين دنيای بی‌کرانه را جدی نگرفتم٬ حتی عشق را..." -- حسین پناهی

item.title: fateme add a quote by Anna Akhmatova
item.description: "You will hear thunder and remember me, and think: she wanted storms..." -- Anna Akhmatova

item.title: fateme add a quote by Nazım Hikmet
item.description: "… and the most beautiful words ever spoken, I have not yet said to you." -- Nazım Hikmet

item.title: fateme add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: fateme add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "When I had nothing to lose, I had everything. When I stopped being who I am, I found myself." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: fateme add a quote by José Saramago
item.description: "I don't think we did go blind, I think we are blind, Blind but seeing, Blind people who can see, but do not see." -- José Saramago

item.title: fateme add a quote by José Saramago
item.description: "...you have to leave the island in order to see the island, that we can't see ourselves unless we become free of ourselves, Unless we escape from ourselves you mean, No, that's not the same thing." -- José Saramago

item.title: fateme add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "But life isn't hard to manage when you've nothing to lose." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: fateme add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Memories warm you up from the inside. But they also tear you apart." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: fateme add a quote by haruki murakami
item.description: "Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional." -- haruki murakami

item.title: fateme add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description:
"Sometimes fate is like a small sandstorm that keeps changing directions. You change direction but the sandstorm chases you. You turn again, but the storm adjusts. Over and over you play this out, like some ominous dance with death just before dawn. Why? Because this storm isn't something that blew in from far away, something that has nothing to do with you. This storm is you. Something <i>inside</i> of you. So all you can do is give in to it, step right inside the storm, closing your eyes and plugging up your ears so the sand doesn't get in, and walk through it, step by step. There's no sun there, no moon, no direction, no sense of time. Just fine white sand swirling up into the sky like pulverized bones. That's the kind of sandstorm you need to imagine.
An you really will have to make it through that violent, metaphysical, symbolic storm. No matter how metaphysical or symbolic it might be, make no mistake about it: it will cut through flesh like a thousand razor blades. People will bleed there, and <i>you</i> will bleed too. Hot, red blood. You'll catch that blood in your hands, your own blood and the blood of others.
And once the storm is over you won't remember how you made it through, how you managed to survive. You won't even be sure, in fact, whether the storm is really over. But one thing is certain. When you come out of the storm you won't be the same person who walked in. That's what this storm's all about." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: fateme add a quote by J. D. Salinger
item.description: "Anyway, I keep picturing all these little kids playing some game in this big field of rye and all. Thousands of little kids, and nobody's around - nobody big, I mean - except me. And I'm standing on the edge of some crazy cliff. What I have to do, I have to catch everybody if they start to go over the cliff - I mean if they're running and they don't look where they're going I have to come out from somewhere and catch them. That's all I do all day. I'd just be the catcher in the rye and all. I know it's crazy, but that's the only thing I'd really like to be." -- J. D. Salinger

item.title: fateme add a quote by Jean de La Fontaine
item.description: "A person often meets his destiny on the road he took to avoid it." -- Jean de La Fontaine

item.title: fateme add a quote by فرهاد جعفری / Farhad Jafari
item.description: "یه جور غم انگیز؛ خنده دار. یا شایدم یه جور خنده دار؛ غم انگیز" -- فرهاد جعفری / Farhad Jafari

item.title: fateme add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "Rather than love, than money, than fame, give me truth." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: fateme add a quote by Irving Stone
item.description: "There are no faster or firmer friendships than those formed between people who love the same books." -- Irving Stone

item.title: fateme add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: fateme add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: fateme add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: fateme add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: fateme add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus
